remarks: Equality theorem for restricted uniqueness quantifier, with bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable restrictions. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Jun-2017.)
statement:
raleq1f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
raleq1f.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
rmoeq1f $p |- ( A = B -> ( E* x e. A ph <-> E* x e. B ph ) ) $.
